body: Now that your sample kit is on its way, we wanted to share some of the science that makes Purrify different from other odor solutions.
Unlike scented litters that mask odors with fragrances (which can irritate sensitive cats), Purrify uses molecular adsorption to actually trap and eliminate odor compounds.

emails.subject: How Dr. Sarah's clinic added $2,400/year with Purrify
emails.preview_text: A real success story from a veterinary partner

body: We wanted to share a quick success story from one of our veterinary partners in Ontario.

body.quote: We started recommending Purrify to clients who complained about litter box odor - which is honestly most of them. The product practically sells itself. We now move about 15 units a month just from word-of-mouth among our clients.
body.author: Dr. Sarah L.

items: Many clinics report 20-30 units/month after 6 months

body: The key to Dr. Sarah's success? She keeps a demonstration litter box in her waiting room with Purrify applied. Clients can smell the difference themselves.
We'd love to help you achieve similar results at {{clinic_name}}.
